trans-unit.source: The System.ServiceModel.Activities.Activation namespace contains the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Activation.WorkflowServiceHostFactory" /> that provides instances of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.WorkflowServiceHost" /> in managed hosting environments where the host instance is created dynamically in response to incoming messages.
trans-unit.target: O namespace System.ServiceModel.Activities.Activation contém o <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Activation.WorkflowServiceHostFactory" /> que fornece instâncias da <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.WorkflowServiceHost" /> em ambientes de hospedagem gerenciada em que a instância de host é criada dinamicamente em resposta a mensagens de entrada.
